Detailed Description

Artificial focal plane image generator.

A SkyView object generates the positions in the focal plane of the list of sample star positions.

bool dpk::SkyView::measure ( double  guiderx,
double  guidery,
double  box,
double &  xmeas,
double &  ymeas 
) [virtual]

Measure star position.

This method seaches the list of star positions for a star that lies inside the guider box and returns its position if one is found.

Returns:
Star was found
Parameters:
guiderx  x position of guider
guidery  y position of guider
box  guider box size
xmeas  measured x position
ymeas  measured y position
